text: Jeriꞌ xubꞌano rech rumal ri bꞌiꞌtal loq xuqujeꞌ ri chꞌekom tzij, are waꞌ kebꞌ jastaq ri man kakꞌexetaj ta wi, rumal cher ri Dios man kubꞌan ta bꞌanoj tzij. Waꞌ we riꞌ kuya ukuꞌlibꞌal qakꞌuꞌx rumal cher are kaqaj chi ri Dios kujuchajij, xuqujeꞌ qas kuꞌl wi qakꞌuꞌx chi kuya na chaqe ri ubꞌim loq.
